speaker: Doctor
text: Good morning, Mrs. Thompson. How have you been feeling on your current medications?

speaker: Patient
text: Morning, Doctor. I've been okay, but I'm a bit worried about the warfarin. I remember the bleeding episode I had last year.

speaker: Doctor
text: I understand your concern. Have you noticed any new bruising or bleeding recently?

speaker: Patient
text: No, nothing like that. But I do get a bit anxious about it sometimes.

speaker: Doctor
text: That's understandable. We can review your INR levels to ensure they're within the safe range. Have you been able to keep up with your regular blood tests?

speaker: Patient
text: Yes, I've been going for my tests regularly. I just want to make sure I'm doing everything right.
